Subskills.name: Extended Flames
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of fire nova.

Subskills.name: Scorching Bolts
Subskills.description: Now unleash piercing fireballs in all directions instead of a nova.

Subskills.name: Heat Haze
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by fire nova.

Subskills.name: Crushing Flames
Subskills.description: Fire nova knocks monsters back dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Rapid Flames
Subskills.description: Increases your cast rate when casting fire nova.

Subskills.name: Mirror Flames
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional fire nova.

Subskills.name: Vacuum Flames
Subskills.description: Fire nova now vacuums monsters inside stunning and dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Armageddon Bolts
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to drop armageddon bolts down from the sky.

Subskills.name: Agonizing Flames
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Molten Trail
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to send a trail of molten lava forward.

Subskills.name: Traveling Flames
Subskills.description: Send a traveling nova forward unleashing additional novas with increased damage and area of effect radius.
